Text: All pumps will have a fixed maximum depth.
The fixed depth for all pump maximum depths
All pumps will use a multiplier for maximum depth.
The multiplier for all pump maximum depths
The conversion rate for water product vs. volume (Game default: 0.2, meaning Water Pumps take 0.2cm³ to produce 1 Water product and Water Dumps produce 0.2cm³ per Water product)
The amount of water per second that the mechanical pump pumps (Game default: 0.25cm³/s). ⚡ Note: changing this also increases or decreases power usage accordingly, see below.
By default, this mod keeps the power usage at 700HP per 0.25cm³. Use this modifier to increase or decrease (cheater :P) that ratio. Game default: 1x
The multiplier for water production time. For example: Game default is 0.33 hours for 1 Water for Water Pumps; setting this to 0.5 will make it 0.16.5 hours for 1 Water.
